text: Scholarship of Teaching and Learning in Psychology is a peer-reviewed academic journal established in 2015. It is published by the American Psychological Association. According to its website, the journal "features teacher-ready reviews of current research and contemporary theories as well as empirical research designed to foster systematic intentional changes to improve teaching and learning outcomes." The current editors are Regan A. R. Gurung (Oregon State University) and R. Eric Landrum (Boise State University). The journal is indexed in PsycINFO. == References == == External links == * Category:English-language journals Category:American Psychological Association academic journals Category:Educational psychology journals Category:Quarterly journals Category:Publications established in 2015
title: Scholarship of Teaching and Learning in Psychology
